hook: AI agents just got a whole lot easier to build. We shipped 27 updates this week, but one stands out.
body:
The gap between 'generating content' and 'taking action' is closing fast.

This week, we focused on giving developers the tools to cross that bridge. With 27 PRs merged, here is what is new on the platform:

1. ONE-COMMAND AGENTS
We integrated OpenClaw to bring autonomous web search and action capabilities directly into the workflow. This is not just chat — it is AI that can do things.

2. VIDEO & AUDIO UPGRADES
Multimedia generation got a major boost with Grok Image-to-Video and ElevenLabs Scribe v2 integration. We also unified video resolutions, making it easier to chain different models together in a single pipeline.

3. NEW MODEL FLAVORS
We added GLM-5 and the Qwen-character model. Whether you need raw reasoning power or specialized roleplay capabilities, the menu just got bigger.

4. BETTER DEVELOPER EXPERIENCE
We overhauled the App Showcase UI and merged documentation directly into the Play page. Less context switching means faster building.

Velocity is the only strategy that matters in open source. We are building the most accessible infrastructure for AI creativity, one commit at a time.
cta: Check out the new agent capabilities and let us know what you build.
